pages.title: Green arowana
pages.text: The Asian arowana ($(o)Scleropages formosus$()) comprises several phenotypic varieties of freshwater fish distributed geographically across Southeast Asia.$(br2)While most consider the different varieties to belong to a single species, work by Pouyaud et al.

pages.title: Green arowana
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors ($(o)1 Rare Colors$())$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
